mia 0.98.14

Coerce DADA2 results to MicrobiomeExperiment

makeMicrobiomeExperimentFromDADA2.Rd

makeMicrobiomeExperimentFromDADA2 is a wrapper for the mergePairs function from the dada2 package.

makeMicrobiomeExperimentFromDADA2(...)

Arguments

...

See mergePairs function for more details.

Value

An object of class MicrobiomeExperiment

Examples

if(requireNamespace("dada2")) {
  fnF <- system.file("extdata", "sam1F.fastq.gz", package="dada2")
  fnR = system.file("extdata", "sam1R.fastq.gz", package="dada2")
  dadaF <- dada2::dada(fnF, selfConsist=TRUE)
  dadaR <- dada2::dada(fnR, selfConsist=TRUE)

  me <- makeMicrobiomeExperimentFromDADA2(dadaF, fnF, dadaR, fnR)
  me
}
